title: The Blue planet
creator_credit: Alastair Fothergill, BBC and Discovery Channel
brief_description: A definitive study of the Earth’s sea exploring the extraordinary life of the creatures that inhabit its depths, and the behaviour of the water as it is influenced by the changing currents and tides. Narrated by David Attenborough. For more information go to http://www.bbc.co.uk/nature/programmes/tv/blueplanet/
